title: Siliconplex
description: Maintained and contributed to <u>highend projects</u> which included Entrepreneur's Business Simulator(EBS) and NFT Showroom etc
Complpeted training on <u>SCRUM</u> anthologies
Complpeted training on <u>blockchain development</u> and smart contracts
<u>Deployed projects</u> on remote servers and maintained them
Collaborated with team and brainstormed on ideas to <u>solve technical problems</u> and client's change requests
<u>Prepared documentation</u> such as Project Requirement Document (PRD), Meeting Notes with clients, Project Timeline Estimations, API, Documentation and Project READMEs
<u>Delivered workshops</u> on Blockchain, Ethereum, Arbitrage, Solidity Smart Contracts and Decentralized Applications
<u>Performed R&D</u> operations on new and upcoming projects
<u>Trained Interns</u> and prepared them to work on live projects

title: Pump Jack Dataworks
description: <u>Lead</u> and supervised 5 team members for ongoing projects
<u>Documented</u> and planned solution outline for given problems and assigned tasks to team members as well as collaborated with senior developers
Performed <u>project management</u> for the team's workflow and kept the development process under check
Contributed in backend development and test <u>MERN stack</u> based projects
Utilized <u>SCRUM</u> and <u>AGILE</u> methodologies
<u>Learned new technologies</u> such as Django, Apache Kafka, Redis, React, Express and other Javascript frameworks
Took initiative to offer <u>technical direction</u> and creative solutions to team-mates
<u>Delivered workshops</u> for hands-on to Django for fellow team members
<u>Developed, coded, modified and debugged</u> application programs of varying degree of complexity with full independence
Worked on a <u>Machine Learning</u> based project which kept scores of table tennis player by tracking the ball trajectory

title: The Sparks Foundation
description: <u>Analyzed, identifiedand, interpreted</u> trends and patterns in complex datasets by finding correlations and visualizing with charts
<u>Told stories</u> about discovered insights and presented them
Used <u>PowerBI, Tensorflow and Python</u> to answer business questions
Utilized various professional statistical techniques such as <u>Matthews Correlation Coefficient</u> and <u>TimeSeries Analysis</u>
<u>Researched, reviewed and analyzed</u> existing requirements for different projects
Performed <u>Requirements Engineering</u> for completeness, consistency, comprehensibility, feasibility and conformity to standards
